attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
In many cases HIPS will prevent lots of pensioners and people without savings from selling their homes.

Many without savings will have to borrow to pay for HIPS and will be afraid that if their home fails to sell they will be left owing money which they might not be able to repay.

Many wouldn't dare to borrow on such a flimsy basis and would therefore be forced to stay in unsuitable homes when they might be better off in sheltered housing.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
